title: Refrigerator ROLLER
description: Refrigerator ROLLER PartSelect Number PS12347981 Manufacturer Part Number W11164152 This crisper drawer roller is for refrigerators. Crisper drawer roller lets the drawer glide smoothly. Wear work gloves to protect your hands when installing this part.

installationInstructions.author: LONNIE from SPOTSYLVANIA, VA
installationInstructions.title: Meat drawer shelf was broke
installationInstructions.content: Removed the main top glass shelf from the fridge,slide meat drawer shelf into the side of the glass main shelf.Thats it,you can then install your meat drawer into the new meat shelf bracket.
